definition: to dig up/to appear in an excavation/unearthed/to come up out of the ground

to go out/to come out/to occur/to produce/to go beyond/to rise/to put forth/to happen/(used after a verb to indicate an outward direction or a positive result)/classifier for dramas, plays, operas etc
earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: Xixia Tongguanshan India unearthed in 1983 for the objects.
sentences.chinese: 西夏銅官印1983年出土，爲一級文物。

sentences.english: Xuzhou, mausoleum of the king of Chu Country (about 2148 years ago), where Lanling Meijiu liquor was unearthed;
sentences.chinese: 徐州楚王陵出土的蘭陵美酒距今已有2148年。

sentences.english: Many exquisite funerary objects were extracted from this grave.
sentences.chinese: 這個古墓裏出土了很多精美的隨葬品。

sentences.english: The ancient books and articles in the tombs unearthed in Turpan have proved this historical fact.
sentences.chinese: 吐魯番出土的文書和隨葬品充分證明了這一歷史史實。

sentences.english: It indicated that nutrition value of native hen egg better than those of caging commercial hen's.
sentences.chinese: 結果顯示出土雞蛋的營養價值比籠養雞蛋高。

sentences.english: It seemed so delicate, so weak is the spring night it destroy unearthed.
sentences.chinese: 它顯得那麼嫩，那麼弱，是一夜春風把它摧出土的。

sentences.english: The newly unearthed copper vase is pleasing to the eye and engraved with delicate and intricate traditional designs.
sentences.chinese: 新出土的銅花瓶造型優美，刻有精細複雜的傳統圖案。

sentences.english: An archaeologically valuable ancient tomb was unearthed in the underlying soil of this corn field.
sentences.chinese: 這片玉米地下伏土層中出土了一個有考古價值的古墓。

sentences.english: The cannons were found in 2008 and recovered last year.
sentences.chinese: 這些加農炮與2008年被發現並於去年出土。

sentences.english: Some utensils were in a state of decay when they were unearthed.
sentences.chinese: 有些器皿在出土時已經殘破。

sentences.english: The scientists fixed the date of an excavation.
sentences.chinese: 科學家確定出土文物的時期。

sentences.english: The household tax system of collecting articles by the nine grades families was reflected in the Wu Bamboo Slips excavated in Zhoumalou, Changsha.
sentences.chinese: 長沙走馬樓出土的吳簡中有戶調分爲九品收物的內容。

sentences.english: The most persuasive evidence is the articles unearthed in Mawangdui Han Tomb.
sentences.chinese: 最有說服力的證據是在馬王堆漢墓中出土的。

sentences.english: A tapered pike excavated from Fanshan. The part closest to the bottom is decorated with animal faces.
sentences.chinese: 出土的錐形器，接近底部處亦有獸面紋。

sentences.english: The most ancient millstone was unearthed just nearby.
sentences.chinese: 附近曾經出土過最古老的石磨盤。

sentences.english: Many newly-unearthed cultural relics are set out in the exhibition hall.
sentences.chinese: 展覽館裏陳列着許多新出土的文物。

definition: bronze implement/refers to ancient bronze artifacts, from c. 2,000 BC
the prehistoric Shang dynasty (c. 16th-11th century BC)
a pottery figurine buried with the dead
Qijia neolithic culture, centered around the Gansu Corridor 河西走廊[He2 xi1 Zou3 lang2] c. 2000 BC
Yangshao neolithic culture from the central Yellow river basin, with red and black pottery
oracle bone/bone used for divination, esp. animal scapula
